data.title: February weather
data.meta_description: February weather for Lake Zurich, Illinois: The month with the most snowfall in Lake Zurich is February, when snow falls for 12.8 days and typically aggregates up to 6.22" (158mm) of snow. The last month of the winter, February, is also a subzero cold month in Lake Zurich, Illinois, with temperature in the range of an average high of 31.1°F (-0.5°C) and an average low of 18.9°F (-7.3°C).
data.text:
Average temperature in February

Lake Zurich, IL

Average high temperature in February: 31.1°F

The warmest month (with the highest average high temperature) is July (80.6°F).

The month with the lowest average high temperature is January (27.7°F).

Average low temperature in February: 18.9°F

The month with the highest average low temperature is July (64.9°F).

The coldest month (with the lowest average low temperature) is January (16.3°F).

Average snowfall in February

Lake Zurich, IL

Average snowfall in February: 6.22"

The month with the highest snowfall is February (6.22").

The months with the least snowfall are June, July, August and September (0").

Average snowfall days in February

Lake Zurich, IL

Average snowfall days in February: 12.8 days

The month with the highest number of snowfall days is January (15.5 days).

The months with the least snowfall days are June, July, August and September (0 days).

Average daylight in February /

Average sunshine in February

Lake Zurich, IL

Average daylight in February: 10h and 4min

The month with the longest days is June (Average daylight: 15h and 12min).

The month with the shortest days is December (Average daylight: 9h and 12min).

Average sunshine in February: 3h and 5min

The months with the most sunshine are July and August (Average sunshine: 10h and 6min).

The month with the least sunshine is January (Average sunshine: 3h and 42min).

Average UV index in February

Lake Zurich, IL

Average UV index in February: 2

The months with the highest UV index are July and August (UV index 6).

The months with the lowest UV index are January and December (UV index 1).

Average visibility in February

Lake Zurich, IL

Average visibility in February: 5mi

The months with the highest visibility are March, April, May, June, July, August, September, October, November and December (6mi).

The months with the lowest visibility are January and February (5mi).
